question: Stringer machine ka function kya hai?
expected_answer: Stringer machine solar cells ko ribbon se connect karti hai soldering process ke through

question: Stringer machine mein kitne cells ek saath join hote hain?
expected_answer: Stringer machine mein 10 se 12 cells ek string mein join hote hain

question: Ribbon ka purpose kya hai stringer mein?
expected_answer: Ribbon cells ke beech electrical connection banata hai aur current flow allow karta hai

question: Stringer machine mein temperature kitna maintain karna chahiye?
expected_answer: Stringer machine mein soldering temperature 180 se 220 degree Celsius maintain karna chahiye

question: String inspection mein kya check karte hain?
expected_answer: String inspection mein ribbon alignment cell crack aur soldering quality check karte hain

question: Stringer machine mein flux ka use kyun hota hai?
expected_answer: Flux soldering process mein oxidation prevent karta hai aur better bonding ensure karta hai

question: Cell crack hone ke kya reasons ho sakte hain stringer mein?
expected_answer: Cell crack excessive pressure improper handling ya temperature fluctuation se ho sakta hai

question: String breakage problem ka solution kya hai?
expected_answer: String breakage ke liye ribbon tension adjust karein temperature check karein aur cell quality verify karein

question: Laminator machine ka main purpose kya hai?
expected_answer: Laminator machine solar module ke layers ko heat aur pressure se bond karti hai EVA ke through

question: Lamination process mein temperature kitna hota hai?
expected_answer: Lamination process mein temperature 145 se 155 degree Celsius maintain hota hai

question: EVA ka full form kya hai?
expected_answer: EVA ka full form Ethylene Vinyl Acetate hai jo encapsulant material hai

question: Lamination cycle time kitna hota hai?
expected_answer: Standard lamination cycle time 15 se 20 minutes hota hai depending on module size

question: Delamination problem kaise identify karein?
expected_answer: Delamination mein EVA layer cells se alag ho jaati hai white spots ya bubbles dikhte hain

question: Vacuum level laminator mein kitna maintain karna chahiye?
expected_answer: Vacuum level -0.9 se -1.0 bar maintain karna chahiye proper air removal ke liye

question: Laminator mein yellowing kyun hoti hai?
expected_answer: Yellowing excessive temperature ya prolonged heating se hoti hai EVA degradation ki wajah se

question: Pre-heating stage mein kya hota hai laminator mein?
expected_answer: Pre-heating stage mein module temperature gradually increase hota hai uniform heating ke liye

question: Pre EL machine ka purpose kya hai?
expected_answer: Pre EL machine lamination se pehle cells ki electroluminescence testing karti hai defects detect karne ke liye

question: EL testing mein kya check hota hai?
expected_answer: EL testing mein cell cracks micro cracks aur inactive areas detect hote hain

question: Pre EL mein forward bias current kitna use hota hai?
expected_answer: Forward bias current 0.1 se 0.5 ampere per cell use hota hai EL imaging ke liye

question: Dark spots EL image mein kya indicate karti hain?
expected_answer: Dark spots inactive areas ya cracks indicate karti hain jo power loss cause karti hain

question: Post EL machine kab use hoti hai?
expected_answer: Post EL machine lamination ke baad final quality check ke liye use hoti hai

question: Pre aur Post EL mein difference kya hai?
expected_answer: Pre EL lamination pehle aur Post EL lamination baad hoti hai dono mein defect detection purpose same hai

question: Sun Simulator ka purpose kya hai?
expected_answer: Sun Simulator solar module ki power output measure karta hai artificial sunlight conditions mein

question: STC conditions kya hoti hain?
expected_answer: STC Standard Test Conditions hai 1000 W/m2 irradiance 25 degree cell temperature aur AM 1.5 spectrum

question: Flash test mein kya parameters measure hote hain?
expected_answer: Flash test mein Voc Isc Pmax Fill Factor aur efficiency measure hoti hai

question: Low power output ke possible reasons kya hain?
expected_answer: Low power shading cell mismatch poor soldering ya degradation ki wajah se ho sakti hai

question: Calibration sun simulator ki kab karni chahiye?
expected_answer: Sun simulator calibration daily ya har 100 modules test karne ke baad karni chahiye

question: Tabber machine ka function kya hai?
expected_answer: Tabber machine cells par ribbon attach karti hai interconnection ke liye

question: Tabbing ribbon ki width kitni hoti hai?
expected_answer: Tabbing ribbon ki width typically 1.2 se 2.0 mm hoti hai cell size ke according

question: Framing process mein kya hota hai?
expected_answer: Framing process mein aluminum frame module ke around fit kiya jaata hai protection ke liye

question: Frame sealant kyun use hota hai?
expected_answer: Frame sealant moisture ingress prevent karta hai aur frame ko glass se bond karta hai

question: Junction box ka purpose kya hai?
expected_answer: Junction box module ki wiring contain karta hai aur external cables se connection provide karta hai

question: Bypass diode ka function kya hai junction box mein?
expected_answer: Bypass diode shaded cells ko bypass karta hai hotspot prevent karne ke liye

question: Hi-Pot test kyun karte hain?
expected_answer: Hi-Pot test module ki insulation integrity verify karta hai high voltage leakage check karne ke liye

question: Hi-Pot test voltage kitna apply hota hai?
expected_answer: Hi-Pot test mein typically 3000V DC ya 1500V AC apply hota hai safety standards ke according

question: Visual inspection mein kya check karte hain?
expected_answer: Visual inspection mein cell cracks scratches contamination aur alignment defects check karte hain

question: IR thermography se kya detect hota hai?
expected_answer: IR thermography se hot spots faulty connections aur defective cells detect hote hain

question: Glass loading process mein kya precautions leni chahiye?
expected_answer: Glass loading mein proper handling gloves use aur edge damage avoid karne ki precautions leni chahiye

question: Glass thickness solar module mein kitni hoti hai?
expected_answer: Glass thickness typically 3.2mm hoti hai tempered low iron glass use hota hai
